pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read AIFF Files and Convert to WAVE Format // Functions are provided to read and convert AIFF audio files to WAVE (WAV) format. This supports, for example, use of the 'tuneR' package, which does not currently handle AIFF files. The AIFF file format is defined in https://web.archive.org/web/20080125 221040/http://www.borg.com/~jglatt/tech/aiff.htm and https:// www.mmsp.ece.mcgill.ca/Documents/AudioFormats/AIFF/Docs/AIFF- 1.3.pdf .
